TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFormatProvider

summary.span: 提供機制來擷取要控制格式的物件。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for retrieving an object to control formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面提供格式化和剖析作業中提供的格式資訊的物件。The interface supplies an object that provides formatting information for formatting and parsing operations. 格式設定作業會將型別的值轉換成該值的字串表示。Formatting operations convert the value of a type to the string representation of that value. 典型的格式化方法會`ToString`方法的類型，以及。Typical formatting methods are the `ToString` methods of a type, as well as . 剖析作業轉換成該類型的值的字串表示。Parsing operations convert the string representation of a value to a type with that value. 典型的剖析方法都`Parse`和`TryParse`。Typical parsing methods are `Parse` and `TryParse`. 介面所組成的單一方法， 。The interface consists of a single method, . 是一個回呼方法： 剖析或格式化方法會呼叫它，並將它傳遞物件，表示格式化或剖析方法預期的物件類型將提供格式設定資訊。 is a callback method: The parsing or formatting method calls it and passes it a object that represents the type of object that the formatting or parsing method expects will provide formatting information. 方法負責傳回該型別的物件。The method is responsible for returning an object of that type. 實作通常會以隱含方式使用的格式化和剖析方法。 implementations are often used implicitly by formatting and parsing methods. 例如，方法會隱含地使用代表系統的目前文化特性的實作。For example, the method implicitly uses an implementation that represents the system's current culture. 實作也可以指定明確的具有類型參數的方法，這類和。 implementations can also be specified explicitly by methods that have a parameter of type , such as and . .NET Framework 包含下列三個預先定義的實作，以提供用於格式化或剖析數值及日期和時間值的特定文化特性的資訊：The .NET Framework includes the following three predefined implementations to provide culture-specific information that is used in formatting or parsing numeric and date and time values: - 類別，可提供資訊，用來格式化數字，例如貨幣、 千分位分隔符號和特定文化特性的小數點符號。The class, which provides information that is used to format numbers, such as the currency, thousands separator, and decimal separator symbols for a particular culture. 如需所辨識的預先定義的格式字串物件，並在數值格式化作業中使用，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).For information about the predefined format strings recognized by a object and used in numeric formatting operations, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 類別，可提供用來格式化日期和時間，例如特定文化特性或順序和格式的日期的年、 月和日元件的日期和時間分隔符號符號的資訊。The class, which provides information that is used to format dates and times, such as the date and time separator symbols for a particular culture or the order and format of a date's year, month, and day components. 如需所辨識的預先定義的格式字串物件，並在數值格式化作業中使用，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).For information about the predefined format strings recognized by a object and used in numeric formatting operations, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 類別，其代表特定文化特性。The class, which represents a particular culture. 其方法會傳回特定文化特性或是物件，取決於是否物件會在格式化或剖析牽涉到數字或日期和時間的作業。Its method returns a culture-specific or object, depending on whether the object is used in a formatting or parsing operation that involves numbers or dates and times. .NET Framework 也支援自訂格式。The .NET Framework also supports custom formatting. 這通常牽涉到建立會實作格式化類別和。This typically involves the creation of a formatting class that implements both and . 此類別的執行個體則做為參數傳遞至方法，例如執行自訂格式化作業中，範例說明這類的自訂實作，為的 12 位數客戶編號的數字格式化。An instance of this class is then passed as a parameter to a method that performs a custom formatting operation, such as The example provides an illustration of such a custom implementation that formats a number as a 12-digit account number. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何實作可以變更的日期和時間值的表示法。The following example illustrates how an implementation can change the representation of a date and time value. 在此情況下，單一的日期會顯示使用代表四個不同的文化特性的物件。In this case, a single date is displayed by using objects that represent four different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/provider2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/provider2.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何將類別可實作介面和方法。The following example illustrates the use of a class that implements the interface and the method. `AcctNumberFormat`類別將表示帳戶號碼的格式化的 12 位數客戶編號值。The `AcctNumberFormat` class converts an value that represents an account number to a formatted 12-digit account number. 其`GetFormat`方法會傳回參考目前`AcctNumberFormat`執行個體，如果`formatType`參數是指實作的類別，否則`GetFormat`傳回`null`。Its `GetFormat` method returns a reference to the current `AcctNumberFormat` instance if the `formatType` parameter refers to a class that implements ; otherwise, `GetFormat` returns `null`. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#2)] 實作的類別然後可以呼叫格式化和剖析作業中使用。The class that implements can then be used in a call to a formatting and parsing operation. 例如，下列程式碼呼叫方法來產生包含的格式化的 12 位數客戶編號的字串。For example, the following code calls the method to generate a string that contains a formatted 12-digit account number. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetFormat(class System.Type formatType) cil managed
Public Function GetFormat (formatType As Type) As Object

param.name: formatType
param.span: 物件，指定要傳回的格式化物件的型別。

span.span: An object that specifies the type of format object to return.

summary.span: 傳回物件，這個物件為所指定型別提供格式化服務。

span.span: Returns an object that provides formatting services for the specified type.

returns.span: 如果 實作可以提供該型別的物件則為 所指定的物件執行個體，否則為 。

span.span: An instance of the object specified by , if the implementation can supply that type of object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一個回呼方法，以格式化和剖析方法叫用來擷取在剖析作業或輸出字串在格式化作業中的格式輸入字串的格式的相關資訊。 is a callback method that formatting and parsing methods invoke to retrieve information about the format of the input string in parsing operations or the format of the output string in formatting operations. 在 `formatType`參數、 格式化或剖析方法會傳遞執行其作業所需的物件型別。In the `formatType` parameter, the formatting or parsing method passes the type of object it requires to perform its operation. 如果實作可以提供這格式化或剖析物件，它會傳回該物件。If the implementation can supply this formatting or parsing object, it returns that object. 如果沒有，它會傳回`null`。If not, it returns `null`. 例如，在呼叫方法，方法引數是物件，提供格式化的字串表示，目前的 「 整數 」 執行個體的可能方式的相關資訊。For example, in the call to the method, the method argument is an object that provides information about how the string representation of the current integer instance might be formatted. 當執行階段執行方法時，它會呼叫物件的方法並將它傳遞物件，表示型別。When the runtime executes the method, it calls the object's method and passes it a object that represents the type. 如果物件可以提供物件，它會傳回該物件。If the object can supply a object, it returns that object. 如果它無法提供該類型的物件，它會傳回`null`。If it cannot supply an object of that type, it returns `null`. 您可以實作介面和提供自訂格式化或剖析服務的類別中的方法。You can implement the interface and the method in classes that provide custom formatting or parsing services. 實作會再做為引數傳遞至剖析或格式化具有一個型別的參數之方法的任何多載，例如， ，或。The implementation is then passed as an argument to any overload of a parsing or formatting method that has a parameter of type , such as , , or . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將類別可實作介面和方法。The following example illustrates the use of a class that implements the interface and the method. `AcctNumberFormat`類別將表示帳戶號碼的格式化的 12 位數客戶編號值。The `AcctNumberFormat` class converts an value that represents an account number to a formatted 12-digit account number. 其`GetFormat`方法會傳回本身的參考，如果`formatType`參數是指類別可實作; 否則`GetFormat`傳回`null`。Its `GetFormat` method returns a reference to itself if the `formatType` parameter refers to a class that implements ; otherwise, `GetFormat` returns `null`. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#2)] 執行個體`AcctNumberFormat`類別接著會做為引數傳遞至方法，提供格式化或剖析服務。An instance of the `AcctNumberFormat` class can then be passed as an argument to a method that provides formatting or parsing services. 例如，下列程式碼傳遞`AcctNumberFormat`類別來方法產生的已格式化的 12 位數客戶編號。For example, the following code passes an `AcctNumberFormat` class to the method to generate a formatted 12-digit account number. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#1)]
